alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 7:52PM MDT until July 31 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 751 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Kiowa, or 32 miles southeast of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Nickel size hail was reported in Elizabeth as this storm passed. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kiowa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
